description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Toxic (7), Unbalanced

Note: Weapon: Sword. Daemon WP 77 (Greater Daemon of Nurgle), Bind Str 4. Att.: Bile-Quenched, Pestilent Stench, Plague Carrier. Must be Dedicated to Nurgle to wield. If get 5+ DoS on parry, attacker hits themselves. Non Daemon, Machine, or From Beyond Creatures wounded by weapon lose half their actions next turn, everyone not devoted to nurgle in 7m suffer -10 to WS, BS, Agility, Intelligence, and Perception Tests, Toxic Trait also deals 2d10 nonpermenant Toughness Damage which spreads to any that touch the target within 7 rounds if they fail +0 Toughness Test.
